name: UpdateGithubProjectCard
description:
Update an existing project card on GitHub.

Use this tool to modify the details of a project card in a GitHub project. Ideal for updating card information such as changing the note or moving it between columns.

parameters.name: card_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the GitHub project card to be updated.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the card.

parameters.name: card_note
parameters.description: The text note associated with the project card. It can include details or remarks.

parameters.name: set_card_archived_status
parameters.description: Specify true to archive the card or false to unarchive it.

value_schema.description: Whether or not the card is archived

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the card.

value_schema.description: Whether or not the card is archived
